extDescription.message: Help non-English developers to check whether the translation of the current page is behind the corresponding English version.

behindDays.message: This page is $1 days behind the latest version.

isUpToDate.message: This page is the latest version.

behindLessThanOneDay.message: This page is a little behind the latest version.

curPageUpdatedTime.message:
Last updated time of this page:
$1

enPageUpdatedTime.message:
